description: Corrected the application version in package.json to ensure the footer displays the current version number.

Comprehensive bug fixes and improvements across the application. Fixed employee exit workflow to correctly unassign assets and update status. Corrected data inconsistencies in reports by replacing IDs with names. Improved asset assignment forms with searchable dropdowns and prevented assignment to inactive employees. Fixed UI scroll issues in dropdowns.
Implement an automated versioning system and add a changelog page to track all application updates. The app version is now 0.1.1.
